title: 190-200s ping help plz
body: Went on to a game and instantly go 190 ping which went up and down to 200 and that was a hell of an experience. I think Orcon (nz isp) has something to do with this, however I don't know what to do as its only league that is lagging and everything else is fine. Any advise is welcome

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and a link to your ICSI netalyzr results.

I'm also sitting around 190-200, i'm with slingshot, something is wrong with some nz isp's connection to the server atm.


Tracing route to rio1370642.lnk.telstra.net [165.228.9.78]
over a maximum of 30 hops:

Its really bad going to that last router on the 14th hop
